live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52469.summary: Some customers in Olds are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52469.title: Aug 11 - Olds | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
